    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout, Navigateable

    public class NavigationMenu<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Button>
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Table
implements Navigateable
    Provides a fully-fledged navigation menu which can be used to navigate over multiple buttons via controller or keyboard.
    Since:
    0.4.10
